sentences.english: They have tended to assume increasing opportunity costs.
sentences.chinese: 他們往往假定機會成本是遞增的。

sentences.english: First, it will increase the opportunity cost of the recipient’s rejoining the labor force.
sentences.chinese: 第一，它會增加受助者再就業的機會成本。

sentences.english: This is the cost due to lost opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲失去機會成本。

sentences.english: Off-farm employment increases the opportunity costs of schooling.
sentences.chinese: 非農就業則導致接受教育的機會成本增加了。

sentences.english: In otherwords, it is the project’s opportunity cost of capital. To value the project, discount the expected cash flow by the opportunity cost of capital
sentences.chinese: 換言之，這是修建辦公樓的資本的機會成本。

sentences.english: The cost of capital is once again thereturn foregone by not investing in securities.
sentences.chinese: 資本的機會成本是指放棄投資證券所能夠獲得的回報。

sentences.english: I REMAIN concerned about the opportunity cost of Fed actions.
sentences.chinese: 我依然密切關注着美聯儲行動的機會成本。
